title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 6-2.6 - Public inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 6-2.6 - Public inspection of records

State Regulations
(a) Records shall be made available both
electronically and at the main office of the department. (b) Whenever practicable, records shall be
made available at the New York City office of the department. (c) The department shall accept requests for
records and produce records during regular business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
6-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
